verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a star <S%G792><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> fallen unto <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of the pit <S%G5421><s%> of the abyss <S%G12><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the pit <S%G5421><s%> of the abyss <S%G12><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there went up <S%G305><s%> a smoke <S%G2586><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the pit <S%G5421><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> furnace <S%G2575><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the air <S%G109><s%> were darkened <S%G4654><s%> by reason <S%G1537><s%> of the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of the pit <S%G5421><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the smoke <S%G2586><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> forth locusts <S%G200><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the scorpions <S%G4651><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it was said <S%G4483><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should <S%G91><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> green thing <S%G5515><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> such <S%G3748><s%> men <S%G444><s%> as have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads <S%G3361><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it was given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should <S%G615><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should be tormented <S%G928><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> torment <S%G929><s%> was as <S%G5613><s%> the torment <S%G929><s%> of a scorpion <S%G4651><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> it striketh <S%G3817><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G2212><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G2147><s%> in no <S%G3756><s%> wise find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they shall <S%G2147><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> to die <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> fleeth from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the shapes <S%G3667><s%> of the locusts <S%G200><s%> were like unto <S%G3664><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> war <S%G4171><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto gold <S%G5557><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faces <S%G4383><s%> were as <S%G5613><s%> men <S%G444><s%>'s faces <S%G4383><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the hair <S%G2359><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> teeth <S%G3599><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> teeth of lions <S%G3023><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%>, as it were <S%G5613><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%> was as <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of chariots <S%G716><s%>, of many <S%G4183><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%> rushing <S%G5143><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> war <S%G4171><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto scorpions <S%G4651><s%>, and2532, 2258 stings <S%G2759><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%> is their <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> men <S%G444><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> They have <S%G2192><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> as king <S%G935><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the abyss <S%G12><s%>: his name <S%G3686><s%> in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> is Abaddon <S%G3><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Greek tongue <S%G1673><s%> he <S%G846><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> Apollyon <S%G623><s%>.
The first <S%G1520><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> is past <S%G565><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, there come <S%G2064><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> Woes <S%G3759><s%> hereafter <S%G5023><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a <S%G3391><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G5064><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> of the golden <S%G5552><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

one saying <S%G3004><s%> to the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> one trumpet <S%G4536><s%>, Loose <S%G3089><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are bound <S%G1210><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> Euphrates <S%G2166><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were loosed <S%G3089><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> had been prepared <S%G2090><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> month <S%G3376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> year <S%G1763><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should kill <S%G615><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the armies <S%G4753><s%> of the horsemen <S%G2461><s%> was twice <S%G1417><s%> ten thousand <S%G3461><s%> times ten thousand <S%G3461><s%>: <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the horses <S%G2462><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the vision <S%G3706><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of fire <S%G4447><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of hyacinth <S%G5191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of brimstone <S%G2306><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the2776, 2462 heads <S%G2776><s%> of lions <S%G3023><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> mouths <S%G4750><s%> proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> smoke <S%G2586><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%>.

By <S%G5259><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> plagues was the third part <S%G5154><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> killed <S%G615><s%>, by <S%G1537><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%> and2532, 1537 the smoke <S%G2586><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1537><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> mouths <S%G4750><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> of the horses is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%> are like unto <S%G3664><s%> serpents <S%G3789><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> they hurt <S%G91><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of mankind <S%G444><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G615><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>, repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should <S%G4352><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the idols <S%G1497><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of silver <S%G693><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of brass <S%G5470><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of stone <S%G3035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of wood <S%G3585><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> see <S%G991><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> hear <S%G191><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%>:

and they <S%G3340><s%> repented not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> murders <S%G5408><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sorceries <S%G2532><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thefts <S%G2809><s%>.
